mapper.select: select sys_.* from sys_system sys_ order by sys_.seque asc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_system(system_id, system_name, system_icon, system_desc, url, seque, memo)values(#{system_id}, #{system_name}, #{system_icon}, #{system_desc}, #{url}, #{seque}, #{memo})
mapper.update: update sys_system set system_name=#{system_name}, system_icon=#{system_icon}, system_desc=#{system_desc}, url=#{url}, seque=#{seque}, memo=#{memo} where system_id=#{system_id}
update sys_system set is_enabled=#{is_enabled} where system_id=#{system_id}
